Title: GTranslator for Windows
Description:
A quick and easy translation interface to Google Translate. Use Windows+T to access the translation window (screenshot). Use Control+Enter after typing to copy the translated result to the clipboard or Escape to exit.

Very quick and handy! Feel free to post any remarks or sugges
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A quick and easy translation interface to Google Translate. Use Windows+T to access the translation window (screenshot). Use Control+Enter after typing to copy the translated result to the clipboard or Escape to exit.

Very quick and handy! Feel free to post any remarks or sugges

Click here to download the installer.



GTranslator is a quick and easy translation tool. Translate text as you type! Use the 'Windows + T' key combination to open the semi-transparent translation dialog.
The easy Control + Return combination allows you to copy the translated result directly to the clipboard. Using the system tray icon you can easily access the swift translator without resorting to hotkeys.

Google and Google Translate are registered trademarks of Google Inc.
